name: White Stratus
description:
White Stratus is a Global Google Partner, specializing in helping Google’s largest customers transform their enterprises to take advantage of the Apps platform. We focus 100% on Google technologies, and our expertise covers strategic planning, technical development and change management services. 
We have direct offices in 5 countries (USA, UK, Amsterdam, Japan, Australia) and solution delivery centers in regions like Kentucky, USA and Eastern Europe, to ensure cost effective delivery of our expertise. 
Customers like Ahold, Burberry, Trinity Mirror and Sealed Air trust White Stratus to help them drive value from their Google Apps platform.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 3rd Floor St George's House 6 St George's Way
